# Inkdrop

> Inkdrop is a note-taking app for Markdown lovers. Built for software developers, designers, and writers who want to organize their thoughts and knowledge efficiently with a powerful, hackable Markdown editor.

## Inkdrop Features

### Core Writing & Editing
- **Markdown Editor**: Powerful editor with GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) support
- **Live Preview**: Side-by-side editing and real-time preview
- **Syntax Highlighting**: Code blocks with highlighting for 100+ programming languages
- **Distraction Free Mode**: Hide UI elements to focus on writing
- **Rich Text Support**: Tables, task lists, footnotes, and alerts
- **Color Code Preview**: Inline visualization of HEX, RGB, and HSL colors
- **Image Management**: Embed, resize, and manage images directly in notes

### Note Organization
- **Notebooks**: Hierarchical folder structure with unlimited nesting
- **Tags**: Multi-tag support with emoji compatibility
- **Note Statuses**: Track notes as Active, On Hold, Completed, or Dropped
- **Pin Notes**: Keep important notes at the top
- **Advanced Search**: Powerful search with qualifiers (book:, tag:, status:, title:, body:)
- **Note History**: Navigate through previously viewed notes

### Security & Privacy
- **End-to-End Encryption**: AES-256 encryption for all data
- **Zero-Knowledge Architecture**: Your password never leaves your device
- **Two-Factor Authentication**: TOTP-based 2FA support
- **Local-First Design**: Full functionality offline
- **Self-Hosted Option**: Use your own CouchDB-compatible sync server
- **Transport Security**: TLS/SSL for all data transfers

### Cross-Platform Sync
- **Desktop Apps**: Native apps for macOS, Windows, and Linux
- **Mobile Apps**: Full-featured iOS and Android applications
- **Automatic Sync**: Seamless synchronization across all devices
- **Offline Mode**: Work without internet, sync when connected
- **Revision History**: Restore previous versions of any note
- **Continuous Backup**: Automatic local backups while working

### Integration & Extensibility
- **Plugin System**: 100+ community plugins available
- **Theme Support**: Customizable UI, syntax, and preview themes
- **Vim Mode**: Complete Vim keybinding support
- **Web Clipper**: Browser extensions for Chrome and Firefox
- **Mobile Share**: Save content via iOS/Android share sheets
- **Alfred & Raycast**: macOS launcher integrations
- **MCP Server**: AI integration for Claude, ChatGPT, and other LLMs
- **Custom Keybindings**: Fully customizable keyboard shortcuts

### Developer Features
- **Local API**: HTTP API for third-party integrations
- **Plugin Development**: Comprehensive API for custom plugins
- **Theme Creation**: Design your own UI and editor themes
- **Command Line Tool**: ipm (Inkdrop Plugin Manager)
- **Custom URI Schemes**: inkdrop:// protocol for automation
- **Direct Database Access**: CouchDB-compatible local database

### Import & Export
- **Evernote Import**: Migrate notes from Evernote
- **Kindle Highlights**: Import Kindle reading highlights
- **Markdown Export**: Export notes as standard Markdown files
- **Web Publishing**: Share notes publicly with unique URLs
- **Data Portability**: Full control over your data
- **HTML Import**: Import notes from other applications

### Productivity Features
- **Quick Note**: Create notes with global shortcuts
- **Note Templates**: Reusable templates for common note types
- **Multi-Selection**: Batch operations on multiple notes
- **Note Linking**: Create connections between related notes
- **Task Management**: Interactive checkboxes and status tracking
- **Global Search**: Find anything across your entire note collection

### Additional Features
- **Math Support**: LaTeX formula rendering (via plugin)
- **Emoji Support**: GitHub-style emoji codes
- **Touch Gestures**: Swipe navigation on supported devices
- **Mouse Navigation**: Back/forward buttons support
- **Network Proxy**: Corporate firewall compatibility
- **Auto-Update**: Keep the app up-to-date automatically
- **Multi-Language**: Interface localization support
